title: Farmworker strike affects supply of strawberries

content.prompt: Which of the following would shift the short-run supply curve for strawberries?

choices.label: A decrease in the consumption of strawberries
An increase in the price of strawberries
An announcement of a study that shows the health benefits of eating strawberries

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
